text: Events from the year 1919 in Russia ==Events== * 8th Congress of the Russian Communist Party (Bolsheviks) * Battle of Berezina (1919) * Kiev pogroms (1919) * Suchan Valley Campaign ==Births== * December 23 - Vasily Reshetnikov, Soviet Air Force pilot ==Deaths== * July 6 - Joe Marqolov, Soviet General * * ==References== Category:Years of the 20th century in Russia
title: 1919 in Russia
